title: Mining Predictive Maintenance in Western Australia: The Definitive 2026 Guide to Asset Health

hero_image.alt: Hero image for Mining Predictive Maintenance in Western Australia: The Definitive 2026 Guide to Asset Health

image_prompt: A photo-realistic, cinematic wide shot of a modern open-pit mine in the Pilbara region of Western Australia during the "golden hour" sunset. The red earth contrasts with high-tech mining equipment. In the foreground, a diverse group of three mining professionals (one female, two male) are wearing full PPE (high-vis orange shirts with reflective strips, hard hats, safety glasses). They are looking at a large industrial tablet held by the middle person, but we only see the back of the tablet. The background shows a large conveyor system and a crusher plant. The image should convey technology, safety, and the scale of Australian mining. No text or overlays.
